agent.name: Special Collections Research Center, The George Washington University

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Online copy: Artifacts: Leather case, with green lettering "Dr. Walter Freeman" contains 2 heavy duty TOL leucotomes (used when roof of the orbit was so tough it was not possible to swing leucotome in an arc and cut the pathways in the frontal lobes of the brain)

mods.mods:note: Special Collections Research Center, The George Washington University, 2130 H Street NW, Washington, 20052, United States of America (https://library.gwu.edu/scrc/contact)

div.LABEL: Online copy: Artifacts: Leather case, with green lettering "Dr. Walter Freeman" contains 2 heavy duty TOL leucotomes (used when roof of the orbit was so tough it was not possible to swing leucotome in an arc and cut the pathways in the frontal lobes of the brain)
